description: Dua is the intimate act of calling upon Allah — seeking help, expressing gratitude, or asking for forgiveness. It is a form of worship and a direct connection between the believer and the Creator. Dua can be made at any time, in any language, and about any matter — big or small.

importance.text: And your Lord says, 'Call upon Me; I will respond to you.'
Indeed, they used to hasten to good deeds and supplicate Us in hope and fear, and they were humbly submissive to Us.

types_of_dua: Dua for personal needs (e.g., health, success, marriage)
etiquettes_of_dua: Begin with praise of Allah and sending peace on the Prophet ﷺ
Have full conviction Allah will respond

hadiths.text: The most beloved speech to Allah is the servant’s saying: ‘O Allah, forgive me. O Allah, have mercy on me.’

benefits: Brings peace and hope to the heart
Leads to acceptance of other deeds
